description:
The evil trio head to Kagoshima Prefecture, Japan, in the year 1866. There, they happen to find Sakamoto Ryoma and his wife, Oryo, who are visiting some hot springs. Apparently, the Dynamond is back at the inn they are staying at. They arrive at the room they`re staying in and find that it`s overflowing with junk. That`s when Tokio and Calen arrive. They then get into an organizing battle, but Tokio and Calen happen to bring a professional organizer from the future!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu no Fuunji Sakamoto Ryouma ga Nippon de Hajimete Itta Bikkuri Dokkuri na Koto to wa!?
What Super Surprising Thing Was the Mercenary of the Bakumatsu, Sakamoto Ryoma, the First to Do in Japan?!
幕末の風雲児坂本龍馬が日本で初めて行ったビックリドッキリなこととは!?
